description.part1: I'm a 27-year-old fullstack developer from Brazil with lot of experience in C# and the .NET platform, as well as front-end development using React.
description.part2: I enjoy exploring new technologies, and I like Node.js with TypeScript
description.part3: I'm also interested in the world of data science, particularly with Python, Pandas, and Apache Airflow. But I'm just getting started on this journey.
